Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
class that represents the main controller of the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    collectPlayerStats()
    method that collects the stats of the player after the end of the game and stores it in the file ranking.txt, rewriting the row that contains the player's username if it's present or adding a new row otherwise
    Level
    getCurrentLevel()
     
    int
    getCurrentLevelNumber()
     
    GameController.GameState
    getGameState()
     
    UserInputController
    getInputController()
     
    LoopController
    getLoop()
     
    private void
    initGame()
    private method that initializes a game, it's used either to start the first game and to restart a game after a quit, a win or a loss
    private void
    loosing()
    method that is used to end the game when the player has lost
    private void
    nextLevel()
    method that is used to change the current level, it is called when the number of alive enemies and the number of enemybubbles are 0
    void
    reset()
    method that resets the collections of the level, the player's stats and powerups and the hashmaps for the observers
    void
    setAvatar(String s)
     
    void
    setEnemySet()
    method that saves in an HashSet the enemies in the level and adds an observer for each one of them The observer is the corresponding view of every enemy: every enemy is assigned to the correct observer through an hashmap
    void
    setUsername(String s)
     
    private void
    spawnPowerUp()
    method that spawns a random powerup in a random cell
    private void
    updateBubblePositions()
    method that for every bubble in the level, checks if that bubble has an observer, updates the position of the bubble and in the end adds to the collection the bubbles in an auxiliary set, used to prevent the ConcurrentModificationException in the main bubble set
    private void
    updateEnemiesPosition()
    method that for every enemy in the level, checks if that enemy has an observer, updates the position in the field and checks if that enemy has collided with a bubble blown by the player
    void
    updateGame()
    method that is called by the loop controller to update the position on every entity in the game
    private void
    updateItems()
    method that checks if every item has an observer
    private void
    updatePlayerPosition()
    method that updates the player's position in the game and checks if the player collided with a bubble or with an enemy
    private void
    updatePowerUps()
    method that checks if every powerup has an observer
    private void
    winning()
    method that is used to end a game when the player won

  • Method Details

    • initGame

      private void initGame()
      private method that initializes a game, it's used either to start the first game and to restart a game after a quit, a win or a loss

    • setEnemySet

      public void setEnemySet()
      method that saves in an HashSet the enemies in the level and adds an observer for each one of them The observer is the corresponding view of every enemy: every enemy is assigned to the correct observer through an hashmap

    • reset

      public void reset()
      method that resets the collections of the level, the player's stats and powerups and the hashmaps for the observers

    • getInputController

      public UserInputController getInputController()

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(String s)

    • getCurrentLevelNumber

      public int getCurrentLevelNumber()

    • getLoop

      public LoopController getLoop()

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame()
      method that is called by the loop controller to update the position on every entity in the game

    • updateEnemiesPosition

      private void updateEnemiesPosition()
      method that for every enemy in the level, checks if that enemy has an observer, updates the position in the field and checks if that enemy has collided with a bubble blown by the player

    • updateBubblePositions

      private void updateBubblePositions()
      method that for every bubble in the level, checks if that bubble has an observer, updates the position of the bubble and in the end adds to the collection the bubbles in an auxiliary set, used to prevent the ConcurrentModificationException in the main bubble set

    • updatePlayerPosition

      private void updatePlayerPosition()
      method that updates the player's position in the game and checks if the player collided with a bubble or with an enemy

    • updateItems

      private void updateItems()
      method that checks if every item has an observer

    • updatePowerUps

      private void updatePowerUps()
      method that checks if every powerup has an observer

    • spawnPowerUp

      private void spawnPowerUp()
      method that spawns a random powerup in a random cell

    • nextLevel

      private void nextLevel()
      method that is used to change the current level, it is called when the number of alive enemies and the number of enemybubbles are 0

      public GameController.GameState getGameState()

    • winning

      private void winning()
      method that is used to end a game when the player won

    • loosing

      private void loosing()
      method that is used to end the game when the player has lost

    • collectPlayerStats

      private void collectPlayerStats()
      method that collects the stats of the player after the end of the game and stores it in the file ranking.txt, rewriting the row that contains the player's username if it's present or adding a new row otherwise
